name: separate
constraint: (declare-const RO_SPEC Int)(declare-const RI0_SPEC Int)(assert (= RO_SPEC RI0_SPEC))
(declare-const CO_SPEC Int)(declare-const CI0_SPEC Int)(assert (= CO_SPEC (+ CI0_SPEC 1)))
(declare-const IG0_SPEC Int)(declare-const OG_SPEC Int)(assert (= IG0_SPEC OG_SPEC))
(declare-const IH0_SPEC Int)(declare-const OH_SPEC Int)(assert (>= (+ IH0_SPEC 2) OH_SPEC))
(declare-const IC0_SPEC Int)(declare-const OC_SPEC Int)(assert (<= (+ IC0_SPEC 2) OC_SPEC))
